Culling Strike.name: Culling Strike
stats: Culling Strikes kill Normal enemies if their life is at 30% or below.
Magic enemies are instead killed at 20%, Rare at 10% and Unique at 5%.
These thresholds are checked before the damage of the Hit is applied.

Decimating Strike.name: Decimating Strike
stats: Hits against Full Life Enemies remove between 5% and 30% of Life, before the damage of the Hit is applied.

Concentration.name: Concentration
stats: Enemies have less Cooldown Recovery Rate the lower their Concentration, scaling down to 50% less Cooldown Recovery Rate when Concentration is 0%.

Global Defences.name: Global Defences
stats: Global Defences refers to Armour, Evasion rating, Energy Shield, and Ward.

Armour.name: Armour
stats: Armour is a form of defence that mitigates incoming physical damage from hits.

Ancestrally Boosted.name: Ancestral Boost
stats: An Ancestrally Boosted Skill has 20% more damage and area of effect.

Ancestral Boost.name: Ancestral Boost
stats: An Ancestrally Boosted Skill has 20% more damage and area of effect.

Aftershocks.name: Aftershocks
stats: Aftershocks are bursts of area damage that occur after the initial impact of the skill causing them.
If not otherwise specified, the Aftershock will deal the same damage as the initial impact, in the same area.

Crushing Blows.name: Crushing Blows
stats: Crushing Blows cause a Heavy Stun on enemies that are Primed for Stun.

Primed for Stun.name: Primed for Stun
stats: Normal enemies are Primed for Stun when they have at least 40% Heavy Stun buildup.
Magic enemies are instead Primed at 60% buildup, Rare at 70%, and Unique at 80%.

Heavy Stun.name: Heavy Stun
stats: Hitting an enemy builds towards a Heavy Stun based on the damage dealt.
Different enemies have different Heavy Stun thresholds and durations, with very large monsters having a high Heavy Stun Threshold.
Players cannot be Heavy Stunned.
While an enemy is Heavy Stunned, they cannot act and count as Immobilised
Physical damage and Melee Damage each cause 50% more Heavy Stun buildup.
These bonuses are multiplicative with each other.

Heavy Stunned.name: Heavy Stun
stats: Hitting an enemy builds towards a Heavy Stun based on the damage dealt.
Different enemies have different Heavy Stun thresholds and durations, with very large monsters having a high Heavy Stun Threshold.
Players cannot be Heavy Stunned.
While an enemy is Heavy Stunned, they cannot act and count as Immobilised
Physical damage and Melee Damage each cause 50% more Heavy Stun buildup.
These bonuses are multiplicative with each other.

Arcane Surge.name: Arcane Surge
stats: Arcane Surge grants 10% more Cast Speed and 20% more Mana Regeneration Rate.

Tailwind.name: Tailwind
stats: Tailwind is a stacking Buff which grants 1% increased movement speed, 3% increased Skill Speed and 15% increased Evasion Rating per stack for 10 seconds, refreshing whenever you gain another stack.
Maximum 10 stacks.

Far Shot.name: Far Shot
stats: Projectile deal 0% more Hits Damage to targets in the first 3.5 metres of their movement, scaling up with distance travelled to reach 20% after 7 meters.

Point Blank.name: Point Blank
stats: Projectile deal 20% more Hits Damage to targets in the first 3.5 metres of their movement, scaling down with distance travelled to reach 0% after 7 meters.

Flames of Chayula.name: Flames of Chayula
stats: Collecting Flames of Chayula grants the following bonuses:
Red Flames of Chayula Leech 7% of your maximum Life to you
Blue Flames of Chayula Leech 7% of your maximum Mana to you
Purple Flames of Chayula provide a stacking Buff granting 7% of damage as Chaos damage for 5 seconds, and stacks up to 10 times.
